analysis: The documents consist of executive orders that delegate presidential authority to various government officials and agencies. They cover a wide range of topics, including foreign assistance, science and technology policy, small business innovation, intelligence operations, refugee assistance, national defense, water resources, foreign service salaries, housing, foreign gifts, agriculture, information agencies, national security, budget, aviation, army and air force rations, and immigration. Many of the orders amend or revoke previous executive orders.
title: Delegation of Presidential Authority to Agencies
